text: Earl Pomeroy (born September 2, 1952 in Barnes County, North Dakota) is an American lobbyist for hospitals and a former politician of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives for North Dakota from 1993 to 2011. == References == * www.govtrack.us Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American lobbyists Category:United States representatives from North Dakota Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Earl Pomeroy
